import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate,Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import"./CSS/LoginSignup.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[name,setName]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const history=useNavigate();async function submit(e){e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post("http://localhost:8000/Signup",{name,email,password});console.log(res);if(res.data==="Login successful"){alert("User Already Exist");}else if(res.data==="Invalid email or password"){history("/",{state:{name}});}//  console.log(a.data);
